name: Kirby Super Star Ultra
description:
Kirby’s Ultimate Adventures!

Run, float and fight your way through the adventure games as Kirby,
gulping down enemies as you go. Kirby can inhale enemies and spit them
out as stars, but the main game play comes from swallowing foes and
copying their abilities, then using the abilities to defeat other foes
and advance past obstacles.

Features:

• With so many adventures waiting to be unlocked, there’ll never be a
dull moment!

• Includes three new touch-screen-controlled mini-games that you can
play with up to three friends via DS Download Play

• The original modes found in the beloved Super NES game, Kirby Super
Star are all here with updated graphics

• You can even have a friend adventure with you as a Helper via local
wireless!
